description: G2000 hails from Hong Kong and the brand's G2000 Man collection caters to smart wardrobe essentials that offer fashion trifecta namely: style, quality and value. Constructed in a twill shirt design, this sleek piece is steeped in a classic white shade for stylish sophistication. This piece is infused with wrinkle-free elements and taped seams for crease resistance and durability. Refined with clean-cut lines, this is the perfect piece to add into your workwear collection for a professional look.
